1.content: What version of Knut do you want?
1.title: Knut versions

11.content: How fat do you want to start him as?

12.content: How fat do you want to start him out as?
12.title: Hairless-original version

choices: Knut wakes up. Pogle is sleeping next to him.
Knut rubs his belly, thinks of ways to impress his friends.
121.content: Knut woke up, with his hand on his belly. He groaned, & ripped a huge fart, followed by an ogrely grunt. He shratched his chubby ass. He smiled, as he felt his ass fat jiggle. He greatly enjoyed being a chubby ogre. His friends Pogle, & Brone were constantly teasing him for being the runt of the group. Pogle, & Brone were taller, & much fatter than knut. They stood at 7' tall, & weighed 1,000# each. They had huge round guts. Fat, round tits, & big round asses. They were well tanned, & smooth. They were the piggest pigs Knut had ever known. They scratched, belched, & farted a lot. They walked around Ogresville flaunting their huge bodies, & piggishness. Being ogres, meant that manners didn't exist. Ogresville, being an all male town, was full of piggishness. Weather ogres were fat, or muscular. Piggishness, was a sign of ogrelyness. Knut being one of the smallest ogres in Ogresville, was determined to prove his taunting friends wrong. He was determined to fit in, whatever it takes.
121.title: His normal weight

info.brief_description: Knut from “Winx Club” starts to pack on the pounds.
info.description:
A little known fact about Knut before starting; he's well' an ogre (duh!!!) with yellow skin. He also wears a purple tracksuit.


The Rules:

Rule 1: Only Knut can gain weight.

Rule 2: No females allowed; only men.

Rule 3: All men are gay.

Rule 4: Knut or any other men cannot die.

Rule 5: Knut can be as fat as possible.

Rule 6: Language is allowed.

Rule 7: No toilet/pooping.

Rule 8: Knut can only be clothed in the first couple of chapters; unless he grows too fat, than he can go naked.

Rule 9: Make paragraphs as long as possible.

Other than that, enjoy and have fun!
